title: Horse Property on 40 Acres
posting_body: Country living on 40 acres horse property.
Cottage 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, Kitchen, with great room with high ceilings.
washer/dryer, forced air heat, septic system and well water.
Secluded cottage 1 mile off  main rd.
Security gates and security cameras on property.
Outside 60x60 coral with a loafing shed.
landscaped yard with auto sprinkler system and
Land lord lives on the property in a separate home.
Applicants must provide current credit report &FICO score with application.
Pets only with pre-approval ( pet fee apply) 12month term
South Denver, Inverness, Park Meadows, Castle Rock, Centennial, Highland Ranch.
